name: Heaven To Hell
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 70
Theme: Heaven
Limitation: The player is an inanimate object

Since the theme is Heaven, we went for Angels versus Demons. As for the limitation, the angels are guided by the Holy Book. Shoot your way through hordes of demons and recruit more angels to fight alongside with you.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Up, Down, Left, Right to move
Mouse 1 or Left Ctrl to shoot

Credits:

Code and Game Design by Akusan
Art by OrangeScientist1
Additional art from OpenGameArt
Audio from Ultimate SFX and Music Collection
